name: Eraser_1
description:
Hi there! This is my very first project as a video game developer.  My small 2D platformer game is 1001% hand-made (zero "stealed" assets, songs, etc). Enjoy!

Note: to start the game, press "NEW" (due to some unknown error in game, it loads you elsewhere… personalized save state… or something)

Controls: Movement: (A,,D): Jump (Space); Fall (S - through certain objects) Interact (W). Left click to choose in menu and press buttons in UI (LS=load state; EM = exit to menu) + ??? (???)
